attributes.additional_details: to re-nationalize all utillitys. Gas, Electric, Water, Telecoms, and Transport. to take back companys that should never have been sold to shareholders to make profit from essential services. it is all well and good having competition between firms but no one has gained from the sell off of these particular firms apart from the share holders of which the majority recieve very little. I would like the government to take back control of these firms for the majority.
